merchant.name: Domino's
merchant.description_html: An unforeseen mild wind whipped through the app and tore the words right off this screen. It’s an editorial wardrobe malfunction. We’re so ashamed. Please check back later, when we’re fully dressed in colorful words and insight....Buddy, I said MOVE ALONG. Nothing to see here.
